import { useSelector,useDispatch } from "react-redux" export default function Profile(){ const dispatch=useDispatch(); let token=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("token")); dispatch({type:"LOGIN",payload:{user:token.user}}); let user=useSelector(store=>store.user); return

{user.username}

Posts

{user.posts.length}

Followers

{user.followers.length}

Following

{user.following}
}
